    public class ControlsConsole
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    class containing methods for various controls in reinforcement and fortification phase

                                              int selectedArmies)

      • shiftArmiesOnReinforcement

        public int shiftArmiesOnReinforcement​(NodeOfCountry country,
                                      int armies)
        Shifts(or places) the armies of the player on each reinforcement.
        Parameters:
        country - the country node to which armies are added.
        armies - the number of armies to be reinforced.
        Returns:
        the army count left for the player.
